plugins

Class CesarCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugins.CesarCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin

    public class CesarCode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plugin
    This plugin applies a Cesar code to the text (ie. a shift by 1 character: 'a' into 'b', 'b' into 'c',... 'z' into 'a'). Other shifts can be applied.
    Author:
    JC

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface plugin.Plugin

        PACKAGE_NAME

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CesarCode()
      a Cesar code where shift is 1
      CesarCode(int shift)
      Create a code where the shift of character is more than 1 (no more a strict Cesar code)
